text: Aur yateemon ki aazmaish karte raho yaha tak ke woh nikah ke qabil umar ko pahunch jayein. Phir agar tum unke andar ehliyat paao (mature of mind) to unke maal unke hawale kardo , aisa kabhi na karna ke hadd e insaf se tajawuz karke is khauf se unke maal jaldi jaldi kha jao ke woh baday hokar apne haqq ka mutaliba karenge. Yateem ka jo sarparast maaldaar ho woh parheizgari se kaam le aur jo gareeb ho woh maroof tareeqe se khaye. Phir jab unke maal unke hawale karne lago to logon ko ispar gawah bana lo, aur hisab lene ke liye Allah kafi hai
